Text:
Wat a movie.
I hav a problem with Bokutox torrent.Left a comment on your website can u please check that.
Thnx Yify
can anyone tell me how to play 3d hsbs movies. i get two screens wen i play in vlc and GOM player!!!!!!!
how do u watch this? i get 2 screens :( someone help me please?
You need a 3D TV or PC monitor to watch this. My Samsung for instance autodetects it.

If anyone wants to watch a SBS 3D movie in 2D (God knows why you wouldn't just download a 2D version). 1, Download NVIDIA 3D Vision Video Player (It is free from the NVIDIA website). 2, Open the Movie in Side by Side mode. 3, Click View -> Viewing Method -> Monoscopic (or press F4)
